Oh well it looks like being a support will now require more items actives so time to brush up on that, that's kind of awesome. Making support a more interactive and exciting role is cool, but I hope the items aren't too strong since I like my unique support utility.
 
Also rito, smite buffs were the main reason you managed to force junglers to take smite and now you're removing that with plants so welcome back junglers who take exhaust+ignite and never manage to get objectives, I hate you all more than a million toxic yasous and ward teemos.

Also assassin update, too much love for meta things and making adcs life harder so I'm going to have less competent adcs to protect against even more stuff and that's never fun, especially as the skillreqs for a support also increase.

I have mixed feelings about where you are going with this game and I simply hope it's not as bad as it sounds. Also replays are coming!!! HYPE!!!
you do realise the assassin rework aims to make it EASIER to react to assassins ergo, making adc's lives EASIER.

haha well read the fine details of the assassin reworks. It really isn't.

For instance, making fizz harder to peel against. Yep making an assassin that can 100-0 an adc harder to peel against will totally make keeping my out of position caitlynn safe easier. 

Making khazix immune to pink warding. Totally makes it easier to protect my adc against unseen threats. 
Improving Zed's deathmark damage, as if duskblade was killing adcs fast enough. 
Making rengar exclamation mark not give an approximation of how close he is and stopping me from using a sweeper or a pink to reveal him. Yep adc is going to be totally fine and not going to get murderised.

Read the details. For some assassins, yes the counterplay is improved, for instance looks like leblanc will be much easier to peel against, same with katarina. For others not so much and honestly Fizz is slippery enough, stop making it worse.

I have a love-hate relationship with assassins but I honestly feel that even though we're moving to a tank meta, adcs are still having a tough time. Adc is kinda getting the short end of the stick and as a support main, this affects me indirectly as well.

I totally agree with you on this one, As a support main, all that stealth or "camouflage" and not being able to do anything against it, is really going to screw up any defensive play in response to those champions. I can understand that its not fair to pop a pink in Akali's shroud, and I feel like you can still deal with her even if that is not an option, but being unable to reveal a Rengar that is hunting you, well I want to cry, because I won't be able to defend anyone from him, and its a chore as he is now. (Do not get me started on Kha'Zix. 
Riot please stop removing counter play options, you are just making my job harder, and I already have to deal with ADC who think they are melee combatants.

haha glad to see someone agree with me and the melee combatant thing is truer than I'd like to admit. A few ranked games ago I had an adc (vayne I think) who wanted to proxy farm like a singed at lvl7 behind towers and I was just like nope, you're on your own now, Toplane Gnar is my new adc.

Most lol player's will always go for whats optimal, Why? Because that's what they want to set them selves up with the best tools for winning possible, same with runes. if your goal is to achieve multiple optimal masterise for a wide group of champions there would need to be a plethora of options.

How about giving back dominion in customs? thats the only thing this game needs. Without it then its just horrible sums rifts with toxic team mates that will abuse you and ping a million times if you "ks" or kill a minion. How about making the gold and xp 100% EQUAL AND SHARED! so that way, playing as a support doesnt have to feel so horrible and hesitating to kill people. seriously? a highly competitive game like this and i actually have to AVOID killing someone or my adc will get mad at me. what kind of logic is that? and thats just one example of how this game has bred toxicity. Everything should be shared so we dont have to CC them and then stop attacking and hope our adc can finish them off.

Please just bring back Dominion in customs so we can just play hide and seek in peace. i dont ever want to take another step in that slow paced toxic pos Summoners Rift ever again. If you dont want to then how about allowing us to edit settings for a custom game? things like 

disable minions
add x amount of gold per second
increase/decrease walk speed
disable certain items 
change starting gold
decrease/remove cooldowns 

etc etc. Seriously this game could be so amazing, probably the best of all time if you just listened to the community :/

__"How about making the gold and xp 100% EQUAL AND SHARED"__
How about no. This would completely remove an entire level of complexity to the game. Not even going to mention how much this would unbalance the game. Stop complaining, because you just sound like an entitled child. 
__"i actually have to AVOID killing someone or my adc will get mad at me."__
I don't know what world you live in, but if my adc can't get the kill, he'll usually congratulate me for securing it if he's not in a position to finish them off. Also, play with friends. They don't flame you as hard. Unless you don't have any lol.
__"If you dont want to then how about allowing us to edit settings for a custom game?"__
Riot actually mentioned (In a Riot pls or Ask Riot) that a sandbox mode where you could do the things you listed is actually something they are seriously considering, so keep your hopes up.

**"i actually have to AVOID killing someone or my adc will get mad at me."**
_I don't know what world you live in, but if my adc can't get the kill, he'll usually congratulate me for securing it if he's not in a position to finish them off. Also, play with friends. They don't flame you as hard. Unless you don't have any lol._

This response is definitely coming from someone above the Low-Elo bracket, yes some ADC respect that they were not getting that kill without dying for it; **Others** are so kill hungry and self absorbed that they don't care either way, and feel like dying for a kill on the enemy support is better than a tactical retreat. 

Playing with friends is not always an option, especially if you aren't in same ranked brackets, and often it means that you verse opponents who are much higher ranked than you (thanks to balancing ?)

A few of my friends in platinum and higher who are support mains will disagree with your statement about all adcs being fine about kill securing. There will always be a portion of adc mains who will go afk if you accidentally take a kill. I honestly feel this problem is at it's worst in very high and very low elo since alot of my average elo friends don't report this issue nearly as much. The high elo judgement is based off alot of listening to whining from friends and the low elo judgement is from my experience in low elo.

who cares about this "complexity" you mention. as a support you just stand there while they get all the gold from killing minions while a better game designer would make it that as long as you hurt the minion or champ, then everyone involved gets the gold. this creates a more interactive experience, reduces toxic remarks and it makes the game progress a lot faster (summoners rift already suffers from slow paced gameplay such as a lack of a sprint/mount key so you have to slowly walk across the map, sure you could bring teleport but get ready to be abused by your adc/team for not using the right spell, however you are right that playing with a friend will prevent some problems but i am yet to find someone that will allow me to go all out on the enemy and "ks" them) etc etc about why matches last longer then they should.

If im not mistaken, the sandbox will only be single player, atleast at launch until they sort out issues so atleast Riot is somewhat heading in the right direction. i just hope they allow you to edit all the settings (and more) that i listed above and then finally we can play hide and seek.
